transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello, may I please speak with Michelle Harris?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hi Michelle, this is Lisa Martinez from Premier Recovery Associates. I'm calling about an account that's been referred to us. Do you have a moment to discuss this privately?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I'm at work right now. Can you call me back later?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Of course, I completely understand. What time works best for you? I want to make sure this is convenient.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Perfect. I'll call you at 6 PM today at this same number. Is that still the best number to reach you?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Yes, that works. Thank you for being understanding.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Absolutely. I look forward to speaking with you then. Have a good rest of your day.
